title: About GUTTER SHARE COMPANY
subtitle: Established April 11, 2005
description: A trusted business organization serving Ethiopia since 2005

leftContent.title: Who We Are
leftContent.description: Gutter Share Company is a business organization established on April 11, 2005, in accordance with the Commercial Law of Ethiopia. We are strategically located in the heart of Addis Ababa near Piassa, on the Northwest exit, about 300 meters from Ras Desta Hospital, on the road leading from Piassa towards Wingate.

rightContent.title: What We Do
rightContent.intro: We offer a wide range of services from our prime location in Addis Ababa:
